task_summary: Mobile robot navigates down a university hallway toward a distant goal indicated along the corridor, retrying navigation until arrival is verified.

task_long_description.overview: The scene is an indoor corridor with tan walls, wood doors, and a low camera viewpoint typical of a ground robot. Across frames, a small white floor cue appears nearer, suggesting forward motion toward a distant doorway or marker that represents the goal. The robot must proceed straight along the hallway, maintain heading alignment, and verify arrival at the designated goal location. Safety and progress robustness are handled by time-bounded navigation attempts with limited retries before declaring failure.
preconditions: Goal location_id 'goal' is defined on the map/mission data
Localization and basic obstacle avoidance active
Hallway is traversable and free of blocking hazards
stepwise_plan: Check if already at the goal using a position condition
If not at goal, execute a timed navigation to location_id 'goal' with forward-facing yaw
Retry the navigation attempt up to three times if the action does not report success
Upon completion, re-check goal proximity to confirm arrival
success_criteria: Navigation finishes within the configured timeout and attempts budget
failure_and_recovery: If navigation times out or returns failure, retry up to 3 times
After exhausting retries, escalate to higher-level planner or request human fallback
task_long_description.termination: Tree returns SUCCESS when IsAt('goal') is true; returns FAILURE after retries are exhausted without reaching the goal

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Timed navigation to a named map location with a specified yaw heading
Checks whether the robot is currently at the goal location

failure_modes: Localization drift causes IsAt to remain false despite proximity
Unexpected obstacle leads to navigation timeout
Odometry slip in low-texture hallway reduces progress
recovery_strategy: Retry navigation with same target within Timeout
If still failing, escalate to higher-level planner or alternative route
Request human assistance if corridor is blocked
assumptions: The distant corridor endpoint or white floor cue represents the 'goal' for this episode
No need for intermediate waypoints; straight hallway is traversable

expected_success_criteria: Final IsAt('goal') returns true after one or more NavigateToNamed attempts
